category.name: Migration Mandatory
category.description: Items that will require changes in order for the migration to be successful.

category.name: Migration Optional
category.description: Items that are recommended, but are not necessarily required for a successful migration.

category.name: Migration Potential
category.description: Items in this category will need to be assessed manually to determine whether or not action is required.

category.name: Cloud Mandatory
category.description: Mandatory items to be reviewed for a successful migration to a cloud environment.

category.name: Cloud Optional
category.description: Optional recommendations for a successful migration to a cloud environment.

category.name: Information
category.description: Additional information found during the analysis.
